ygData.subject: Re: SV: SV: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Su  To:  Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 4:30 PM Subject: Re: SV: SV: [EverQuest] Verant s new
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 4:30 PM
Subject: Re: SV: SV: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..


> Excuse me, but EQ techs actually tell people to disable their firewalls to
> play the game!!! I have seen them do it at tech chats!
> Alot of people don't know that they are at risk. Maybe if Verant warned
them
> it could happen they would know and understand how to protect themselves.
> It's not their faults if they are ignorant of malicious hackers. Verant is
> NOT ignorant of it.
> luv,

Yes! I called Verant Tech Support to try to solve my problem of excessive
LDs. The VERY first question they asked me was if I had a firewall
installed. When I told them I was using ZoneAlarm, they not only told me to
disable it while playing EQ, they told me to totally un-install it. In
addition, they told me to disable Norton Anti-Virus Auto-Protect while
playing the game.

Those two steps did seem to reduce the incidence of LDs, but it didn't
entirely eliminate them. I feel pretty uncomfortable about invasion, though.

Froondor, 36 Wood Elf Druid
Froontor, 26 Barbarian Warrior
Froondoc, 16 Dwarf Cleric
Texxas, 16 Wood Elf Ranger
Xennasserax, 8 Iksar Shaman
All on Tarew Marr
